replies.body:
Normals IS for messing around and trying new things.  If you want to get better play ranked or play ranked on a smurf and focus on improvement.  You could also use flex for improvement as that is still better than normals at matchmaking.

If you are getting sub level 30s in normals its probably because they are either smurfs who the system has identified and rightly moved up or as Xeref stated above, friends of high elos.
